nodes.text: Givoni Airport was a transportation hub that was located on Estalle Island, on the world of Procopia located within the Tapani sector. The majority of the people who worked on Estalle Island lived on one of the less expensive islands on that planet and flew to and from the city via Givoni Airport. As many as two million people passed daily through the terminals of the airport, with up to five million during Capital Season. The airport also handled a lot of cargo transport from spaceports elsewhere on the planet.
